diff_act: 4.generate a related list of project information

regen.absent_element: error handling for invalid SQL queries or project IDs
regen.new_specification: The system shall display an error message to the user if the entered SQL query or project ID is invalid.

regen.absent_element: error handling for invalid SQL queries or project IDs
regen.new_specification: The system shall display an error message when an invalid SQL query or project ID is entered, and provide instructions for correcting the input.

regen.absent_element: handling of invalid or non-existent project IDs
regen.new_specification: The system shall handle and provide feedback to the user when an invalid or non-existent project ID is entered.

label: SQL errors will be reported to the user for correction.
